DataElement.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Quality of the Information Received from Oncologist About Cancer Prognosis 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated rating of the quality of the information their loved one has been given by their oncologist about the likely outcome of their cancer over time, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Quality of the Information Received From Oncologist About Cancer Prognosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional._A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care._A physician who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer._Supply what is desired or needed._A question about a person's rating of the quality of information they have received from an oncologist about treatment and treatment choices available.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Concepts.definition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.
A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Property.preferredName: Oncologist Provide Quality of the Information Received About Cancer Prognosis
Property.preferredDefinition: A doctor who specializes in treating cancer. Some oncologists specialize in a particular type of cancer treatment. For example, a radiation oncologist specializes in treating cancer with radiation.:Supply what is desired or needed.:A question about a person's rating of the quality of information they have received from an oncologist about treatment and treatment choices available.

Concepts.definition: A physician who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer.
Supply what is desired or needed.

Concepts.longName: Quality of the Information Received About Cancer Prognosis
Concepts.definition: A question about a person's rating of the quality of information they have received from an oncologist about treatment and treatment choices available.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PTPQ:Prognosis and Treatment Perceptions Questionnaire as referenced in Associations Among Prognostic Understanding, Quality of Life, El-Jawahri A, et.al., 2014
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 5/28/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard with five text responses related to a rating of quality from excellent to poor.

ReferenceDocuments.name: How would you rate the qualit
ReferenceDocuments.description: How would you rate the quality of the information your loved one has been given by their oncologist about the likely outcome of their cancer over time (i.e. their prognosis)?

DataElement.origin: PTPQ:Prognosis and Treatment Perceptions Questionnaire as referenced in Associations Among Prognostic Understanding, Quality of Life, El-Jawahri A, et.al., 2014
DataElement.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 5/29/14
